description.value:
Wondrous item, rare (requires attunement)
This enameled brass necklace resembles an amorphous white beast wreathed in tentacles with three black eyes in a vertical row in the center. While attuned, the wearer has advantage on Wisdom saving throws but has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws against the natural abilities of an aboleth.
